about_the_game:
143 high-quality & game-ready sound effects for general magic, huge elemental spells, casting loops, healing, and much more.

Features:

70 Elemental Magic Spells (Fire, Arcane, Ice, Water etc...)
35 Elemental Magic Buffs
Healing
Negative Auras
General Casting & more...

- Perfect for any game or project where magic, healing, mage combat are featured.
- Each spell designed by professionals using unique source material, giving you huge variation for your game's magic.

Format:

M4A - Stereo (44.1 Khz, 16bit)
WAV - Stereo (44.1 Khz, 16bit)
OGG - Stereo (44.1 Khz, 16bit)

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
